inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: class IIa, positive anti-AChR antibody test, single fiber electromyography (SFEMG) was positive

exclusion.label: triggers
exclusion.evidence: used as GVHD prophylaxis and to prevent graft rejection

notes: Patient has myasthenia gravis, class IIa. She complains of diplopia and fatigue and weakness that affects mainly her upper limbs.
